subject: Extended CFP:: TAEECE 2013- IEEE- Turkey
from: "The Society of Digital Information and Wireless Communications (SDIWC)" <donotreply@sdiwc.us>
body:
The International Conference on Technological Advances in Electrical, Electronics and Computer Engineering (TAEECE2013) Mevlana University, Konya, Turkey May 9-11, 2013 http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2013/taeece2013/index.php The TAEECE2013 is technically co-sponsored by Region 8 IEEE Section and All papers will be submitted to IEEE for potential inclusion to IEEE Xplore ======================================================================== The proposed conference on the above theme will be held at Mevlana University, Konya, Turkey from May 9-11, 2013 which aims to enable researchers build connections between different digital applications. All the papers will be published in the proceedings of the conference and in SDIWC digital library. The conference welcomes papers on the following (but not limited to) research topics: *Electronics Engineering: <+-+-+> Computer Engineering <+-+-+> Device Electronics for I.C <+-+-+> Electronics System-Level Based Design <+-+-+> Electronics & Nano Electronics <+-+-+> Electronics-Medical Electronics <+-+-+> Micro/Nano Systems and Networks <+-+-+> Mixed Signal Circuits <+-+-+> Mobile Computing <+-+-+> Mobile Robotics *Electrical Engineering: <+-+-+> Software Specification <+-+-+> Software Assurance <+-+-+> Circuits and Electronics <+-+-+> Computer Relaying <+-+-+> Electric Energy Processing <+-+-+> Electromagnetic and Photonics <+-+-+> Electro-optical <+-+-+> Power Electronics <+-+-+> Signal Processing <+-+-+> Smart Grid *Computer Engineering: <+-+-+> Algorithms <+-+-+> Artificial Intelligence <+-+-+> Automated Software Engineering <+-+-+> Bioinformatics and Scientific Computing <+-+-+> Computer-aided Design <+-+-+> Computer Animation <+-+-+> Computer Security <+-+-+> Internet and Web Applications <+-+-+> Mobile Computing <+-+-+> Wireless Communication <+-+-+> Wireless Sensor Network Researchers are encouraged to submit their work electronically. All papers will be fully refereed by a minimum of two specialized referees. Before final acceptance, all referees comments must be considered. Submit your paper at http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2013/taeece2013/openconf/openconf.php Important Dates ============== Submission Date : March 28, 2013 Notification of acceptance : April 20, 2013 Camera Ready submission : April 30, 2013 Registration : April 30, 2013 Conference dates : May 9-11, 2013 Contact ============== Natalie Walker Conference Manager ta@sdiwc.net www.sdiwc.net ---------------------------------------- If you want to unsubscribe to this mail message from SDIWC, just follow this link http://sdiwc.us/Filemailer2/sdiwc-mailer/unsubscribe.php?id=d67fac30874ed23b1c8bf6f96d9f2cb5 The International Conference on Technological Advances in Electrical, Electronics and Computer Engineering (TAEECE2013)
Mevlana University, Konya, Turkey
May 9-11, 2013
http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2013/taeece2013/index.php

The TAEECE2013 is technically co-sponsored by Region 8 IEEE Section and All papers will be submitted to IEEE for potential inclusion to IEEE Xplore
========================================================================
The proposed conference on the above theme will be held at Mevlana University, Konya, Turkey from May 9-11, 2013 which aims to enable researchers build connections between different digital applications. All the papers will be published in the proceedings of the conference and in SDIWC digital library.

The conference welcomes papers on the following (but not limited to) research topics:

*Electronics Engineering:

<+-+-+> Computer Engineering
<+-+-+> Device Electronics for I.C
<+-+-+> Electronics System-Level Based Design
<+-+-+> Electronics & Nano Electronics
<+-+-+> Electronics-Medical Electronics
<+-+-+> Micro/Nano Systems and Networks
<+-+-+> Mixed Signal Circuits
<+-+-+> Mobile Computing
<+-+-+> Mobile Robotics


*Electrical Engineering:

<+-+-+> Software Specification
<+-+-+> Software Assurance
<+-+-+> Circuits and Electronics
<+-+-+> Computer Relaying
<+-+-+> Electric Energy Processing
<+-+-+> Electromagnetic and Photonics
<+-+-+> Electro-optical
<+-+-+> Power Electronics
<+-+-+> Signal Processing
<+-+-+> Smart Grid


*Computer Engineering:

<+-+-+> Algorithms
<+-+-+> Artificial Intelligence
<+-+-+> Automated Software Engineering
<+-+-+> Bioinformatics and Scientific Computing
<+-+-+> Computer-aided Design
<+-+-+> Computer Animation
<+-+-+> Computer Security
<+-+-+> Internet and Web Applications
<+-+-+> Mobile Computing
<+-+-+> Wireless Communication
<+-+-+> Wireless Sensor Network

Researchers are encouraged to submit their work electronically. All papers will be fully refereed by a minimum of two specialized referees. Before final acceptance, all referees comments must be considered.



Submit your paper at http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2013/taeece2013/openconf/openconf.php

Important Dates
==============

Submission Date : March 28, 2013
Notification of acceptance : April 20, 2013
Camera Ready submission : April 30, 2013
Registration : April 30, 2013
Conference dates : May 9-11, 2013

Contact
==============
Natalie Walker
Conference Manager
ta@sdiwc.net
www.sdiwc.net
